name: @touchspin/webcomponent
description: TouchSpin Web Component - Single <touchspin-input> tag for all renderers

scripts.build: yarn run build:deps && rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist/umd && yarn run build:types && yarn run build:js && yarn run build:umd-bootstrap3 && yarn run build:umd-bootstrap4 && yarn run build:umd-bootstrap5 && yarn run build:umd-tailwind && yarn run build:umd-vanilla
scripts.build:js: tsup src/bootstrap3.ts src/bootstrap4.ts src/bootstrap5.ts src/tailwind.ts src/vanilla.ts --format esm --sourcemap --target es2020 --tsconfig tsconfig.build.json
scripts.build:umd-bootstrap3: tsup src/bootstrap3.ts --format iife --global-name TouchSpinWCBootstrap3 --no-dts --sourcemap --target es2020 --tsconfig tsconfig.build.json --outDir dist/umd --external=none && node ../../../scripts/rename-umd.mjs dist/umd/bootstrap3.global.js dist/umd/bootstrap3.touchspin
scripts.build:umd-bootstrap4: tsup src/bootstrap4.ts --format iife --global-name TouchSpinWCBootstrap4 --no-dts --sourcemap --target es2020 --tsconfig tsconfig.build.json --outDir dist/umd --external=none && node ../../../scripts/rename-umd.mjs dist/umd/bootstrap4.global.js dist/umd/bootstrap4.touchspin
scripts.build:umd-bootstrap5: tsup src/bootstrap5.ts --format iife --global-name TouchSpinWCBootstrap5 --no-dts --sourcemap --target es2020 --tsconfig tsconfig.build.json --outDir dist/umd --external=none && node ../../../scripts/rename-umd.mjs dist/umd/bootstrap5.global.js dist/umd/bootstrap5.touchspin
scripts.build:umd-tailwind: tsup src/tailwind.ts --format iife --global-name TouchSpinWCTailwind --no-dts --sourcemap --target es2020 --tsconfig tsconfig.build.json --outDir dist/umd --external=none && node ../../../scripts/rename-umd.mjs dist/umd/tailwind.global.js dist/umd/tailwind.touchspin
scripts.build:umd-vanilla: tsup src/vanilla.ts --format iife --global-name TouchSpinWCVanilla --no-dts --sourcemap --target es2020 --tsconfig tsconfig.build.json --outDir dist/umd --external=none && node ../../../scripts/rename-umd.mjs dist/umd/vanilla.global.js dist/umd/vanilla.touchspin
scripts.build:test: tsc -p tsconfig.testbuild.json && tsup src/bootstrap3.ts --format iife --global-name TouchSpinWCBootstrap3 --sourcemap --target es2020 --tsconfig tsconfig.build.json --outDir ../../../devdist/adapters/webcomponent/umd --external=none && tsup src/bootstrap4.ts --format iife --global-name TouchSpinWCBootstrap4 --sourcemap --target es2020 --tsconfig tsconfig.build.json --outDir ../../../devdist/adapters/webcomponent/umd --external=none && tsup src/bootstrap5.ts --format iife --global-name TouchSpinWCBootstrap5 --sourcemap --target es2020 --tsconfig tsconfig.build.json --outDir ../../../devdist/adapters/webcomponent/umd --external=none && tsup src/tailwind.ts --format iife --global-name TouchSpinWCTailwind --sourcemap --target es2020 --tsconfig tsconfig.build.json --outDir ../../../devdist/adapters/webcomponent/umd --external=none && tsup src/vanilla.ts --format iife --global-name TouchSpinWCVanilla --sourcemap --target es2020 --tsconfig tsconfig.build.json --outDir ../../../devdist/adapters/webcomponent/umd --external=none && node ../../../scripts/write-artifacts-manifest.mjs --dir ../../../devdist/adapters/webcomponent umdBootstrap3Entry=umd/bootstrap3.global.js umdBootstrap4Entry=umd/bootstrap4.global.js umdBootstrap5Entry=umd/bootstrap5.global.js umdTailwindEntry=umd/tailwind.global.js umdVanillaEntry=umd/vanilla.global.js
scripts.watch: tsup src/bootstrap3.ts src/bootstrap4.ts src/bootstrap5.ts src/tailwind.ts src/vanilla.ts --format esm --watch --sourcemap --target es2020 --tsconfig tsconfig.build.json
scripts.test: node ../../../scripts/pre-test.mjs packages/adapters/webcomponent/tests && cd ../../.. && playwright test packages/adapters/webcomponent/tests/

author: TouchSpin Contributors
